DeKALB  Starting Monday NIU OneCard holders will be able to ride the Huskie Bus Line  to the Elburn Metra Station for free PERIOD

The general publics fare will be reduced to  cents per ride PERIOD

Manspreading and improper commuter etiquette has not gone unnoticed by some Huskie Bus riders.Manspreading refers to when people spread their legs and put their belongings on vacant bus seats PERIOD This results in a lack of seats on crowded buses.Though.. PERIOD

The Student Association Senate passed a resolution to approve NIU Progressive Learning in Undergraduate Studies a general education reform program Sunday.Brandon Phillips a member of the NIU PLUS task force Anne Birberick vice provost of Academic.. PERIOD

Students wait on Normal Road in front of the Holmes Student Center for Huskie buses PERIOD The bus turnaround which was relocated to the east side of the Holmes Student Center over the summer is being moved back to the west side PERIOD Pedestrians have complained.. PERIOD

Huskie buses are being moved back to the turnaround on the west side of the Holmes Student Center due to pedestrian safety concerns after a few nearmisses.The bus turnaround was moved to a strip east of the Holmes Student Center on Normal Road.. PERIOD

Kevin BarteltThe sexual assault prevention task force should have transparent goals by the start of the school year.Its great news that the school is taking a stand against sexual assault PERIOD Although the task force is new the members should be open.. PERIOD

The Board of Trustees voted to demolish Douglas Hall extend Lucinda Avenue and plant  trees by the fall semester as the first part of a campus renovation at Thursdays meeting.NIU President Doug Bakers consultant Ron Walters presented the.. PERIOD

More convenient transportation is needed at NIU outside of just campus and DeKalbbased needs.Last week Zipcar a car sharing company extended its services to give students the option of renting and using a car.NIU can stand to learn from Zipcars.. PERIOD
